function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exclusion of vaccines and antivirals from the study","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of interventions in preventing transmission of respiratory viruses","Mitigation":"Include the assessment of vaccines and antivirals in future studies","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, government health agencies"},{"Description":"No language restrictions applied to study search","Impact":"Potential exclusion of relevant studies in other languages","Mitigation":"Conducting additional searches in different languages or using translation services","Technologies":"Translation tools, multilingual databases","People":"Researchers, translators","Owner":"Research institutions, libraries, translation services"},{"Description":"Use of outdated search databases (up to November 2006)","Impact":"Limited access to more recent studies and data","Mitigation":"Conducting supplementary searches in updated databases","Technologies":"Modern search engines, updated databases","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, libraries"}]}
